job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongPrincipal Architect strongppHealth IQ is a community of engineers who are passionate about building quality software that rewards the health conscious Our work environment is collaborative and ownership driven and as a result we build products that are wellconsidered and wellarchitected Your skillset will grow at Health IQ You will join a team excited about the problems we solve and the tools they use to solve themppWhat you will be doingpulliDeveloping new software solutions to improve the efficiencies and observability of the businessliliWork with key stakeholders and technical leadership to define solutions to best solve the problem at handliliLead development and continuously improve critical subsystemsliliExecute the full SDLC including requirements analysis architecture and design specification service development code review testing and deliveryliulpWho were looking forpulliUndergraduate degree in computer science or related technical field required advanced degree preferredlili8 years of relevant experienceliliTechnologiesliliFrontend TypeScriptJavaScript HTML CSS development and the latest webframeworks React Angular etcliliBackend TypescriptNode Ruby Java Python or other serverside objectoriented languages Experience with web frameworks such as Express Rails Spring DjangoliliPassion for scalability latency stability and performance with an innate ability to understand the tradeoffs between acceptable offerings and costsliliSelfmotivated and selfmanaged problem solvers able to jumpin to many areas as requiredliul
